g.text: Consume Prepare event message for Payer
Request to retrieve Transfer Fulfilment message hash (if it exists)
Request Transfer fulfilment duplicate message hash
Return transfer fulfil message hash if it exists
then send notification to Payee and Payer with complete transfer
else ignore and allow normal processing to complete
Request to retrieve Transfer Fulfilment and Transfer state
Request information for the validate checks
Request to retrieve current/latest transfer settlement window
Route & Publish Position event for Payee
Route & Publish Notification event for Payee f
To be delivered by future story
